text.div:
BC LeftRightLateralityVS ValueSet

Simplified set of laterality codes indicating detailing the side(s) of interest. This is a subset of the FHIR body site laterality value set (http://hl7.org/implement/standards/fhir/2015Jan/valueset-bodysite-laterality.html)

name: LeftRightLateralityVS
title: BC LeftRightLateralityVS ValueSet
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Simplified set of laterality codes indicating detailing the side(s) of interest. This is a subset of the FHIR body site laterality value set (http://hl7.org/implement/standards/fhir/2015Jan/valueset-bodysite-laterality.html)
